title: The Rain Snake: A true story of love, faith and trust
description: Oklahoma, 1955, in what once was known as Indian Country, farmer Woody Maxwell is on the verge of losing his farm and all of his crops from a severe drought. The farmer's young daughter wants to help her dad and believes the magic of an Indian Legend will make it rain. Join little Jeannie as she learns a valuable lesson from the magic of the Indian Legend and joyfully discovers the “magic” of prayer.
author: Jeannie Walker
